entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , La Vérendrye (Réserve faunique)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:45 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -20.9°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
